trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented, describes a change to the model tree.
trans-unit.target: 抽象類別，實作此類別時會描述模型樹狀結構的變更。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the undo/redo infrastructure to keep track of the changes made during an editing episode.
trans-unit.target: 復原/取消復原基礎結構會使用這個類別來追蹤編輯時段期間所進行的變更。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.Change" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.Change" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, applies the change to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會將變更套用於目前的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the change was applied to the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要將變更套用至目前的執行個體，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a description of the change.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會取得變更的描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a description of the change.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含變更的描述。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, retrieves the inverse of the change.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會擷取變更的逆元。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.Change" /> that contains the inverse of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.Change" />，其中包含目前執行個體的逆元。
